capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special way with them, and they seem to really care for him too. I mean, who wouldn't want a pet hippogriff or a giant owl? It's just one of the many things that makes Hagrid so endearing, don't you think?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection. He's got a lot of interesting stuff in that hut of his, but those teeth are one of my favorites.
